BookDescription: Pan, His Majesty in Yellow is a fairy tale cosmic horror sandbox campaign setting that combines the lore of Peter Pan, Hastur, Neverland, and Carcosa into a strange and unique experience.
This version is designed for use with the 5th edition of the world's most popular roleplaying game.
